metadata.title: CVE-2018-7438 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in FreeXL before 1.0.5. There is a heap-basedbuffer over-read in the parse_unicode_string function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7438` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfreexl1 - 1.0.2-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freexl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.2-1ubuntu0.1').
